block.p: Estee Sherry Levine, a daughter of Gale and Lawrence Levine of Rockville Centre, N.Y., was married last evening to David Dunlap Little, a son of Margaret and Thomas Little of Lyme, N.H. Judge Ruth Balkin of Nassau County Family Court officiated at the Seawane Club in Hewlett Harbor, N.Y.

The bride, 34, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a counsel to Arthur Levitt, the chairman of the Securities and Exchange Commission in Washington. She graduated from Duke University and with honors from the Duke School of Law.

Estee Sherry Levine, a daughter of Gale and Lawrence Levine of Rockville Centre, N.Y., was married last evening to David Dunlap Little, a son of Margaret and Thomas Little of Lyme, N.H. Judge Ruth Balkin of Nassau County Family Court officiated at the Seawane Club in Hewlett Harbor, N.Y.

The bride, 34, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a counsel to Arthur Levitt, the chairman of the Securities and Exchange Commission in Washington. She graduated from Duke University and with honors from the Duke School of Law.

The bridegroom, 38, is a partner in Lea & Elliott, an engineering firm in Chantilly, Va., that specializes in airport design. He graduated from the University of New Hampshire and received a master's degree in transportation engineering from the University of California at Berkeley.
